fields.text: Thank you for calling the MitchelLake Group in San Francisco, your partner in executive search, consulting, and on-site recruitment solutions.
For executive search and consulting services, press [INDEX].
For candidate placement and leadership searches, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to an executive search specialist.
For talent strategy consulting and advisory, press [INDEX].
One moment please, connecting you to our consulting team.
For on-site recruitment and staffing solutions, press [INDEX].
For project-based on-site recruiting support, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our on-site recruitment team.
For technology innovation talent solutions, press [INDEX].
One moment please, connecting you to a technology talent solutions specialist.
